Security Not in Riches.--Many think to find security in earthly riches. But Christ seeks to remove from their eye the mote that obscures the vision and thus enable 


                                                     613 

them to behold the far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory. They are mistaking phantoms for realities and have lost sight of the glories of the eternal world. Christ calls upon them to extend their view beyond the present and add eternity to their vision.--Lt 264, 1903. (SD 247.)
